info.name: TruckersMP Red Accent V2 (Dark Theme)
info.description:
This style changes the TruckersMP website to a Red accent, instead of Green.

Created by Digital (https://forum.truckersmp.com/index.php?/profile/4963-digital); edited by Joschi (https://forum.truckersmp.com/index.php?/profile/222408-joschi/)

Original: https://userstyles.org/styles/160348/truckersmp-red-accent-dark-theme
info.additionalInfo:
- Removed green shadow from text (e.g. on server status page)
- Applied theme to buttons
- Applied theme to icons
